text: (Nampikkaiyalarkale!) Nayavancakarkalaip parri ninkal en iruvakai karuttuk kolkirirkal? Avarkal ceyta tinkin karanamaka allah avarkalait talai kuniyumpati ceytan. Evarkalai allah tavarana valiyil cella vittuvittano avarkalai ninkal nerana valiyil celutta virumpukirirkalo? (Atu mutiyata kariyam! Enenral napiye!) Evarai allah valitavara vittu vittano avarukku (mitci perrut tara) oru valiyaiyum nir kanamattir
